product_name: OnGuard Akita Key Cable Bike Lock - 15mm
long_description: The OnGuard Akita cable lock offers the ease of a keyed lock head and the convenience of a sturdy 15mm thick, self-coiling cable to simplify your locking needs. 3 ft. 3 in., 15mm-thick cable is made of heavy-duty, twisted steel to offer good cut resistance; highly flexible cable is self-coiling for convenience. X2P Double Bolt lock mechanism secures cable to lock head in 2 places for high pull and pry resistance; dust cover helps protect lock internals. Z-Cylinder tumbler is bump-proof and resists picking, pulling or drilling. Vinyl cable coating and double rubber coating on the lock head help protect paint and finishes. Comes with 5 laser-cut keys, 1 of which has an integrated LED light. Rip-and-stick retention strap helps keep cable orderly during transport. OnGuard rates the OnGuard Akita keyed cable lock as a 43 out of 100 on their 100-point security rating system, where higher-rated locks offer increased security.
short_description: The OnGuard Akita cable lock offers the ease of a keyed lock head and the convenience of a sturdy 15mm thick, self-coiling cable to simplify your locking needs.
